00014 class QString;
00020 template<class function_type>
00021         class CustomFunctionBase {
00022     public:
00023         CustomFunctionBase(): handle (NULL) {}
00024         QString symbolic ();
00025         bool isValid() const { return valid; }
00026 
00027     protected:
00028         bool loadFunction (const QString &, QString = "f");
00029         void setValid() { valid = true; }
00030         void setInvalid() { valid = false; }
00031 
00032         function_type *func;
00033         void *handle;
00034         bool valid;
00035 };

00044         CustomFunction (double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00045                         double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00046                         double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00047                         bool final = true);
00048         virtual ~CustomFunction();
00049

00051         virtual VecMath::Vector<4> &f (double, double, double);
00052 };

00100 #include <dlfcn.h>
00101 
00105 template<class function_type>
00106         bool CustomFunctionBase<function_type>::loadFunction(const QString &libName, QString funcName) {
00107     const char *error;
00108 
00109     handle = dlopen (libName.toStdString().c_str(), RTLD_LAZY);
00110     if (!handle) {
00111         std::cerr << "Error opening library: " << dlerror() << std::endl;
00112         return false;
00113     }
00114 
00115     func = (function_type *)dlsym(handle, funcName.toStdString().c_str());
00116     if ((error = dlerror()) != NULL)  {
00117         std::cerr << "Error finding function: " << error << std::endl;
00118         return false;
00119     }
00120 
00121     return true;
00122 }
00123 
00126 template<class function_type>
00127         QString CustomFunctionBase<function_type>::symbolic () {
00128     typedef char* STRING;
00129     STRING (*sym)();
00130     sym = (STRING (*)())dlsym(handle, "symbolic");
00131     const char *error;
00132     static char *ret;
00133 
00134     if ((error = dlerror()) != NULL)  {
00135         std::cerr << "Error finding symbolic description in " << error << std::endl;
00136         return QString ("something");
00137     }
00138     ret=(*sym)();
00139     return QString (ret);
00140 }
